tool_description: Easily convert an audio file to text
name: V2T-VoiceToText
title: V2T-VoiceToText

api_list.name: TranscriptAudio
api_list.description:
Upload an audio file and select from one of the languages of the list, send the audio by body and the language code in the url
**Languages list: **
Afrikaans (South Africa): af-ZA,
Amharic (Ethiopia): am-ET,
Arabic (Algeria): ar-DZ,
